feed.title: Sri Govindaji Gaudiya Matha
feed.subtitle: Gaudiya Vaishnava Temple located in North-West Houston. It is established under the spiritual guidance of Sri Srimad Bhaktivedanta Narayana Goswami Maharaja.

entry.title: Sri Narasimha Caturdasi
entry.content:
All glories to Shri Shri Guru and Gauranga.
All glories to Shri Shri Radha Govindji.

Hare Krishna.

Please join in the celebration of Lord Narasingha Dev’s appearance day.

This coming Sunday May 11
5:30pm to 7:30pm

Lord Narasingha Dev
Is the Remover of all the obstacles of our devotional life.
Haribol.

🙏 PLEASE NOTE 🙏 SINCE LORD NRISINGH DEV APPEARED AT THE DUSK TIME
PROGRAM IS IN EVENING.

Sri Govindji Gaudiya Matha
16628 Kieth Harrow Blvd.
Houston, TX 77084
📞 (832) 464-4686
www.sggm.org

Haribol.

entry.title: Sri Gaura Purnima
entry.content:
All glories to Shri Shri Guru and Gauranga.
All glories to Shri Shri Radha Govindji.

Hare Krishna.

Shri Govindaji Gaudaiya Matha is inviting all Houston vasis to join
🌻SHRI 🌻 🌹 GAUR PURNIMA🌹 festival,
the appearance day of Lord Chaitanya Mahaprabhu - Krishna Himself.

March 13 , Thursday
6 pm to 9pm.
Program includes Harinam sankirtan, Abhishek, Harikatha, Maha aarti.
Full Prasad will be served.

This is very very magnanimous day. SO join with family and friends to get the blessings of merciful Lord.

Sri Govindji Gaudiya Matha
16628 Kieth Harrow Blvd.
Houston, TX 77084
📞 (832) 464-4686
www.sggm.org

Haribol.

entry.title: Maha Shiva Ratri
entry.content:
All glories to Shri Shri Guru and Gauranga. All glories to Shri Shri Radha Govindji.

Hare Krishna.

MAHA SHIVRATRI
🌹FESTIVAL 🌹
Feb 26 Wednesday
6:30pm to 8:30pm
Please fast like ekadashi.

Mahaprasad Will be served.

Also Shivling will be set-up to offer milk.
MILK OFFERING TIME
10:30am to 1pm
5:30pm to 8:30pm.

Please join with your family and friends* .

Shri Govindji Gaudiya Matha.
16628 Kieth Harrow Blvd.
Houston, TX 77084.
832 464 4686.
www.sggm.org.
Thanks.
Haribol.

entry.title: Sri Nityananda Prabhu’s Appearance Day
entry.content:
All Glories to Shri shri Guru and Gauranga.
All Glories to Shri shri RadhaGovindaji.

Hare Krishna.
Please join the very auspicious celebration - The appearance day of Lord Nityanand at Shri Govindaji Gaudiya Math.

Lord Nityanand is the most merciful
Incarnation and non-differnt
than Lord Balram.

Please hear the Glories of Lord Nityanand and be blessed.

Feb. 10 Monday.
6:30 to 8:30pm.

Maha Prasad will be served.

PLEASE POST THIS ON YOUR FACEBOOK AND WHATSAPP GROUPS.

Haribol.

entry.title: Srila Gurudeva’s Appearance Day
entry.content:
All Glories to Shri shri Guru and Gauranga.
All Glories to Shri shri RadhaGovindaji.

Hare Krishna.
Please attend the divine Appearance day of Srila Gurudev B.V. NARAYAN GOSWAMI MAHARAJ and hear the importance of bonafide GURU and His Glories.

Wednesday, Jan 29
6:30pm to 9pm
Followed by mahaprasad.

SHRI GURU IS THE CONDENSED MERCY OF LORD KRISHNA

Haribol.

entry.title: Srila Gurudev’s Disappearance Day Festival
entry.content:
All Glories to Shri shri Guru and Gauranga.
All Glories to Shri shri RadhaGovindaji.

Hare Krishna.
Please attend the divine disppearance day of Srila Gurudev and hear His Glories.
Monday, December 23 - 6:30pm to 8:45pm.

GURU NISHTHA IS THE BACKBONE OF BHAKTI.

Haribol.

entry.title: Diwali & Govardhan Puja
entry.content:
All glories to Shri Shri Guru and Gauranga.
All glories to Shri Shri Radha Govindji.

Hare Krishna.

Shri Govindji Gaudiya Matha invites all the Houston Vasis to celebrate Diwali and Govardhan puja.

Oct. 31. Thursday
Diwali Eve. Candle light Arati - 7pm

Nov. 2 Saturday.
Govardhan puja - Anna-kuta Mahotsav.
5pm to 7:30pm.
HariNaam sankirtan, Maha Arati followed by big feast - Maha Prasad.

Special Note: This is the day in the whole year that everyone is welcome to cook and bring as many dishes as you want in a bowl size quantity.
Absolutely no onion no garlic.
Cooking pot should be clean preferably new pot.

Or you can bring
DRY items like snacks, dry fruits and dry sweets.

Please bring your dishes max by 6:30pm.

Please come with your family, friends and relatives for
Anna-kuta darshan , Thakur ji s darshan and divine blessings.
To serve in this very auspicious celebrations,
Please post this message to all your groups, Facebook page, websites etc.

Temple address:
16628 kieth harrow Blvd.
Houston TX 77084
832 464 4686
www.sggm.org

Thanks
Haribol.
entry.summary: Diwali Eve: Thursday, Oct 31st @ 7pmGovardhan Puja: Saturday, Nov 2nd @ 5pm

entry.title: Sharad Purnima
entry.content:
Disappearance Day of Sri Param Gurudev

Srila Bhakti Pragyana Keshava Goswami Maharaj

All Glories to Shri shri Guru and Gauranga.
All Glories to Shri shri RadhaGovindaji.

In the honor of Achraya kesri Sri Param Gurudev Srila Bhakti pragyana Keshav Goswami Maharaj, there will be a program at SGGM.

Please join and hear the Glories of Kartik month and Srila Param Gurudev.

Maha Prasad will be served.

Haribol
entry.summary: Disappearance day of Sri Param GurudevSrila Bhakti Pragyana Keshava Goswami MaharajThursday, Oct 17 @ 6:30pm - 8:45pm
